title: Final Preparation with Mikan!?
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Chika-chan, don’t you think you’re eating too many mikan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ruby-chan, you’re over worrying. No matter how many Chika-chan….eh, Wha---!? Wh-, when did you eat that many!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Hmm-?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>One, two, three, four….five<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>You ate 5, are you okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>I’m fine, I’m fine. Mikan is full of vitamins, it’s an essential food for your health<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Even if you say that, I don’t think eating that many is good….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>That’s not true, Ruby-chan. It’s fine…. Because! Winter is Mikan’s season!! When you eat that season’s food it’s soooooo good for your body! You get so much more energy compared to when you eat it during summer! With that said, you two should also eat. Let’s enjoy today’s live to the fullest with mikan power!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Hmm~..., Alright then, I’ll eat! Chika-chan, give me one!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Yo-, You-chan, please also be careful not to eat too much~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
